title: Organizations band together in Moncton to replace school nutrition program
description: About 450 bagged lunches are now delivered throughout the week in the Moncton region, a replacement for school lunch programs halted by the pandemic.
content: About bagged lunches are now delivered throughout the week in the Moncton region a replacement for school breakfast and lunch programs halted by the pandemic The lunches are prepared Monday through Friday and driven on five buses to drop off points chars
